featured.text: The basic structure of roads and bridges. (C) Knowledge and regulations about safe driving.
With the crisis now in its fifth year, basic public services, including education, inside Syria have been stretched to breaking point.

definition.zh_def: 基本的，最簡單的，或最重要的部分。
definition.en_def: Fundamental or essential; forming the base or starting point.
definition.example: She has a basic understanding of mathematics.
